description: Two-hour examination with multiple-choice and short-answer questions assessing lecture and practical class content. Scheduled during the formal examination period.

Individual research project involving a one-page experimental plan (30% of project) and a 750-word final report using AI-generated content with corrections (70% of project). Focuses on solving an authentic genomics research question.
Three 20-minute quizzes in Weeks 3, 5, and 8 containing multiple-choice and short-answer questions based on lecture and practical material. Each quiz contributes 10% to the course total.
